name: Rogue Heroes
description:
Rogue Heroes is fast-paced 2D action-platforming game with RPG elements.

- explore the depth of procedurally generated levels
- upgrade your hero
- level up and collect equipment with unique set bonuses
- complete quests
- discover secrets
- fight against dangerous bosses and enemies
- progress through different locations with deadly traps and obstacles
- earn achievements
- no in-apps, no ads!

http://mykungfugames.com/rogue-heroes/
